column5: Hey all. I am heading up to Sturgeon Bay this week. Not looking for any hot spots but if someone could guide me in the direction of some pike. I have done some research and I see alot about the bass which isn't to helpfull.  Is there much pike in Sturgeon Bay or should I go to some other bays.  Feel free to pm me if you would rather not post.  Thanks.
http://www.ontarioparks.com/english/stur.html  Here? head out of the Sturgeon there are pike all over but the bigger one seem to come from from a bit of distance from people.
